content: pieces 2 brown - 2 olive green make the brown pieces first 1 ch2 single_crochet 2 ch1 turn increase 2 3 ch1 turn increase x2 4 4 ch1 turn increase single_crochet 2 increase 6 5 ch1 turn single_crochet 6 6 ch1 turn increase single_crochet 5 7 7-8 ch1 turn single_crochet 7 2r of 7 9 ch2 turn single_crochet into 2nd chain from hook and the next 7 8 10 ch1 turn single_crochet 7 increase 9 11 ch1 turn increase single_crochet 8 10 12 ch1 turn increase single_crochet 8 increase 12 13-14 ch1 turn single_crochet 12 2r of 12 15 ch1 turn decrease single_crochet 9 increase 12 16 ch1 turn single_crochet 12 17 ch2 turn single_crochet into 2nd from hook single_crochet 10 decrease 12 18 ch1 turn single_crochet 11 increase 13 19 ch1 turn increase x2 single_crochet 11 15 fo and weave in ends of brown pieces for green do not fo but ch1 then use the green to single_crochet a green and brown piece together around the edge not the bottom/flat edge 3sc into the tip the actual number of single_crochet doesn t really matter it s ok if your ears are a little lopsided the brown side is the front of the ear so when putting the second ear together pay attention to the placement of ear #1 the rippled edge is meant to be the bottom of the ears so you will want to make sure the brown side is on the correct side of the ear fo leave a long tail of green for sewing ears to head this is where you will cover the gaps created in round 15 the gap will be even with the center area of the flat edge of the ears just sew the ears over the gap to close/cover it sew the larger of the two mushrooms to the top front side of the right ear sew the smaller mushroom to the top back side of the left ear legs - green - make 2 1 single_crochet 8 into magic_ring 2 increase around 16 3 increase single_crochet around 24 4 increase single_crochet 2 around 32 5-7 single_crochet around 3r of 32 8 decrease x2 single_crochet 28 30 9 decrease x3 single_crochet 24 27 10 decrease x3 single_crochet 21 24 11 decrease single_crochet 2 around 18 12-16 single_crochet around 5r of 18 slip_stitch into next fo leave tail for sewing stuff legs then sew to front sides of the body arms - brown - make 2 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet 3 around 15 4-13 single_crochet around 10r of 15 14 single_crochet half_double_crochet 5 single_crochet 7 15 ch1 turn slip_stitch single_crochet 5 slip_stitch 7 the last two rounds count as the shoulder - fo leave tail for sewing stuff arms then sew to sides just under the neck cheek blooms - 2mm hook - pink - make 2 1 single_crochet 10 into magic_ring slip_stitch to join 2 slip_stitch into 1st stitch same as join ch2
